data: `minecraft:placement_filter` is a component controlled by a `JSON object` that sets rules for under what conditions the block can be placed.
`allowed_faces` and `block_filter` will need to be placed in the "conditions":[] array in order to work properly.

data.Name: allowed_faces
data.Description: List of any of the following strings: up, down, north, south, east, west, side, all

data.Name: block_filter
data.Description: List of blocks (can use tags to specify them) that this block can be placed against in the allowed_faces direction
